Human.description:
Versatile and adaptable, with no inherent weaknesses.

+5% EXP Gain, +2% to All Stats.

Elf.description:
Graceful and attuned to nature and magic.

+5% Magic Damage, +3% Dodge Chance.

Dwarf.description:
Hardy and skilled with craftsmanship and melee combat.

+5% Physical Defense, +3% HP Regen.

Orc.description:
Fierce warriors with immense strength.

+5% Melee Damage, +3% Attack Speed.

Tiefling.description:
Cunning and infused with abyssal energy.

+5% Dark Magic Power, +3% Lifesteal.

Draconian.description:
Descendants of ancient dragons, resilient and powerful.

+5% Elemental Resistance, +3% Critical Damage.
